Desc.entry: Offers advice in the following areas: benefits, immigration, employment, housing, tax, debt, child support and relationship breakdown, etc. Some home visits. Helps with reviews of disability benefits. Arranges family outings and Eid celebrations.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 10am-3pm (office times); Mon-Fri 10am-3pm (drop-in advice), last Fri in every 3rd month (committee meeting)
